issue.title: [C++] Make ARROW_JSON=OFF the default
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6611](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6611). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The JSON-based functionality is only needed for 

- Integration tests
- Unit tests
- JSON scanning
  
  If the user opts in to unit tests or integration tests, then we can flip it on, but I think that the user should opt in when building libarrow
